text: Aurora Solar | https://www.aurorasolar.com/ | Palo Alto, CA | ONSITE | Full Time & INTERNS | VISA | Frontend, Backend Engineer We are building the software platform that powers the the solar industry. Our clients are companies that work on transitioning our society to a future of sustainable energy by selling, designing and installing solar installations. Aurora enables them to do their job better, faster, and more efficiently. Aurora is a cloud-based SaaS solution that allows solar installers to build 3D models of buildings and trees, simulate the impact of shading on a homeowner's roof, design advanced solar systems, calculate the financial return of a solar system and generate beautiful sales proposals. By enabling solar installers to do all of this in a short time and without having to leave their office, Aurora helps to reduce the cost of solar installations and make solar energy more widely available. Frontend Techstack: Ember, Coffee/Javascript Backend Techstack: Ruby on Rails, Postgres If you're interested in working with us, email me at mklocker@aurorasolar.com. Mention you're from HN and let me know what you've been working on lately.
